name: Visidea
author: Inferendo

sections.description:
Visidea: the Visual Search and Product Recommendations plugin for WordPress + WooCommerce

Do you want to personalize your e-commerce UX like Netflix?

With our Visual Search and Product Recommendations plugin, you can move your website to the next level of hyper-personalisation.

Visual search & visual discovery

A complete solution for the visual search and visual discovery that improve the customer journey and inspire your customers.

Shoppers are searching for your products, with camera search you can delight them.

Our visual search and visual discovery solution allows your customers to search your website items simply by snapping a photo from their device, or by uploading a picture from their computer.

Possibilities are endless: imagine your customer walking at the fashion week and looking at an outfit she adores. She can snap a photo and search your website for the products that best match.

Uploading a screenshot of their favorite influencer and finding similar products is now possible with our visual search and visual discovery solution.

Visual recommendations

Our visual recommendation platform automates your item tagging showing the most similar products to the ones your customers are browsing.

Our visual recommendation engine recognizes your items’ images and displays automatically the most similar products. Customers can choose from the original item and similar alternatives.

Product recommendations

Our recommendation engine as a service optimizes sales of your e-commerce website.

Maximize ROI and user engagement with product recommendations.

Suggestions let users find more valuable products to buy and this will increase average cart value (ACV), customer lifetime value (CLV), and consequently optimize return on investment (ROI).

The user interaction and user experience will benefit from a great improvement because every customer will get unique recommendations about products, categories, and brands they like most.

FEATURES

Visidea has different features that adapt to your marketing needs!

  • Connect your e-commerce websites.
  • Setup visual search.
  • Setup visual recommendation carousels.
  • Setup product recommendation carousels.
  • Various recommendation engine algorithms.
  • Collaborative filtering.
  • Content-based.
  • Image-based.

More features are under development and will be available soon.

PRICING

You can start the integration of our recommendation engine with a 14 day free trial. After the trial ends you can continue using the service with the paid plan. You are free to cancel your subscription at any time.
Check our plans and pricing on our website.

WANT TO KNOW MORE?

Discover more on our website: visidea.ai
Want to know more about our recommendation engine or try a demo? Have some questions? – Drop us an e-mail at hello@visidea.ai

Compatible with:

  • WordPress version 6.2
  • Woocommerce version 7.6
sections.installation:
Starting with Visidea consists of just two steps: installing and setting up the plugin.

INSTALL VISIDEA MANUALLY

  1. Upload visidea/ to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Create an account on visidea.ai and copy/paste the tokens in the configuration page

Updating

Automatic updates should work smoothly, but we still recommend you back up your site.
sections.faq:
Can I get a free trial?

You can startup your website with a 14 days free trial.

How much the Visidea service costs?

Check our plans and pricing on our website.

Where can I get help about Visidea?

If you get stuck, you can ask for help in the Visidea Ticket System.

short_description: Visidea is the Visual Search and Product Recommendations plugin for WooCommerce. Visidea improves UX and increases the revenues of your website.
